com.vaadin.tutorial.eventstagram.backend

Class OurEventService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.vaadin.tutorial.eventstagram.backend.OurEventService

  • public class OurEventService
extends java.lang.Object
    Separate Java service class. Backend implementation for the address book application, with "detached entities" simulating real world DAO. Typically these something that the Java EE or Spring backend services provide.
